content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
I fucking need a plumber now, this shit is fucked up!
I understand you're upset. Let's work together to get your plumbing issue resolved. Could you please provide your name?
Name's Bob. Just fix this damn pipe!
Thanks Bob. Could you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
Why? Just come fix it at 123 Elm Street!
Thank you. Let me just check if 123 Elm Street is within our service area.

I’m sorry, Bob, but 123 Elm Street is outside our service area. Unfortunately, we won’t be able to assist with your plumbing issue. If you need help finding a provider in your area, please let me know.
